name: Flight World Simulator
description:
Any issues please send mail to flight@walen.se

Flight World is not a flight simulator in a traditional sense!
This is a commercial jet liner game with innovative game play designed for handheld devices. The special features will keep you busy and entertained as you will be challenged to also maintain the comfort of the flight service inside the aircraft.


Game play
• Build your fleet in career mode, world clock and realtime internet weather.
• Fly either using manual or autopilot, following air traffic controller's instructions to reach your destination
• Make money by selling tickets and answering flight attendant calls while flying.
• Watch out for areas of turbulence to avoid passangers complains


Real life flying experience
• The entire world with height data and satellite imagery (internet connection required)
• All major airports and runways - you can select departure and destination points as you wish
• Multiple aircrafts and airlines
• Air Traffic Controllers guidance (spoken and text) for all countries helping you to navigate safely to your destination
• Real time and real world weather update while you fly (internet connection required)
• Weather settings for offline gaming
• Easy to use instrument landing system (ILS)


ATC language support: English, German, French, Spanish, Swedish!


Flight World does NOT use in-app purchases. All aircrafts and airlines are included and any future additions are free for all users.
